summary: This Mod adds a new sunglare effect to the skyrim world, it IS STANDALONE, and it DOES NOT REQUIRE AN ENB!
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]This Mod adds a new sunglare effect to the skyrim world, it [/size][size=4]IS STANDALONE[/size][size=2], and it[/size][size=4] DOES NOT REQUIRE AN ENB![/size]
[size=2]I made this because i always liked sun glare effects in games and could never have a powerful pc to support enb effects (so i use ENBoost).[/size]
[font=Verdana][size=3]I also could not upload screenshots and would really appreciate it if someone could upload some![/size][/font]
[size=3][u][b]THIS IS MY FIRST MOD!!![/b][/u]

[/size]Original is [u]2k[/u] (First picture)
Fantasy is [u]4k[/u] (Second Picture, I prefer this more)

EDIT: I got FRAPS to work (it was conflicting with skse) so i can upload screenshots!!!

[size=5][b][font=Verdana]ENDORSE ANY MODS YOU LIKE ON THE NEXUS, IT REALLY HELPS![/font]
[/b][/size]
(If you like the save games in the photos i can upload it if you want)

Here is a demo of ORIGINAL by Matthiaswagg:
[youtube]xnUTYCE1ve0[/youtube]

[b]WANT TO SUPPORT ME? I'D APPRECIATE A SUB TOÂ [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFhyAm3BQc2ziLwmdiv84_A]MY CHANNEL...[/url][/b]
author: TH3CR4PM4N
